ComicInfo.Title: Savage Landing Part 02
ComicInfo.Summary:
Celebrating 25 years of Beast Wars! The Maximals, led by Optimus Primal, and the Predacons, led by Megatron, have crashed on a strange new world and they are not alone. To survive the planet, much less each other, theyâ€™ll have to explore their surroundings and their new bestial alt-modes in search of an advantage. The Beast Wars begin here!
